wikipedia_page.main: Brian Ernest Maitland Prophet  (1928–2004) was President of the Bedfordshire Branch of the Soldiers, Sailors and Airmens Family Association and a Deputy Lieutenant for Bedfordshire.  He was awarded the OBE, TD and made Deputy Lieutenant for Bedfordshire in recognition of his long association and work with the Territorial Army, the Royal Signals and the Bedfordshire ACF as well as being an active participant with service charities.

response: * Colonel Brian Ernest Maitland Prophet TD DL. For services to the Soldiers' Sailors' and Airmen's Families Association in Bedfordshire.
*Brian Ernest Maitland Prophet, 76, British civil servant.
* Brian Ernest Maitland Prophet OBE TD DL (1928–2004), Deputy Lieutenant of Bedfordshire
